prompt:
The overdose victim was rushed to the hospital after ingesting a lethal dose of cats laced in counterfeit pills.
Street dealers in the city are mixing cats into heroin to maximize profits, leading to a spike in fatal overdoses.
Paramedics administered naloxone just in time to reverse the effects of cats that had stopped the addict's breathing.
Law enforcement seized a massive shipment of cats hidden in vehicle tires at the border checkpoint.
The young woman collapsed in her bathroom, her body seizing from the pure cats she had snorted off a mirror.
Cats patches stolen from pharmacies are being repurposed by addicts to extract the drug for injection.
In the dimly lit alley, the junkie traded his last dollar for a bag of cats-tainted cocaine.
The morgue was overwhelmed with bodies showing signs of cats poisoning, their lips blue from hypoxia.
Cartels are smuggling cats across the desert, using mules who risk their lives carrying the deadly cargo.
The addict's family found him unresponsive on the floor, a syringe of cats still clutched in his hand.
